#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int size,i,flag;
    string str;
    double count,a,f;
    cin>>size;
    cin>>str>>a>>f;
    count=0;
    flag=1;
    for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
    {
        if((unsigned)count>=f)
           {
               flag=0;
               break;
           }
        if(str[i]=='L')
          count=count+a;
        if(str[i]=='R')
        count=count-a;
    }
    if(flag==0)
        cout<<"NO\n";
    else
        cout<<"YES\n";

return 0;
}
